Events that occurred on 21 November.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1915 – G.B. Smith is shipped to France.
1924 – Christopher Tolkien is born.
1964 – The seventh episode of the Princess-serialization of The Hobbit is published.
1972 – J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 343.
2006 – The RiffTrax commentary of The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring is released online.

content.title: In Arda
content.content:
T.A. 3018:
Frodo and Samwise rest in Rivendell and prepare for their quest to destroy the One Ring.
